episodeTitle: Goodbye My Lovable Followers! Franky Departs!
episodeTitleJapanese: さらば愛しき子分達！フランキー発つ
description: After chasing his swim briefs to the Straw Hats' new ship, Franky initially refuses to join the crew. Through emotional appeals from Iceburg and physical persuasion from Robin, combined with the imminent arrival of Vice Admiral Garp, Franky finally accepts his destiny and becomes the Straw Hat Pirates' shipwright.

events.title: Franky Runs Naked Through Water 7
events.description: Franky runs through the streets of Water 7 without his swim briefs, causing chaos as townspeople react with shock and embarrassment. He declares that even a naked man is great if he faces the waves like a lion.
events.significance: Demonstrates Franky's eccentric personality and his initial resistance to leaving Water 7, while showcasing his carefree attitude.

quotes.text: Even a naked man is great, if he faces the waves like a lion!
quotes.speaker: Franky
quotes.context: Franky defending his decision to remain naked while chasing his swim briefs

events.title: Franky Arrives at the Thousand Sunny
events.description: Franky finally catches up to his swim briefs at the Straw Hats' new ship, the Thousand Sunny, on Scrap Island. He demands that Luffy return them.
events.significance: Brings Franky to the location where he will ultimately join the crew.

events.title: Robin Uses Devil Fruit Powers on Franky
events.description: When Franky refuses to leave with the crew, Robin uses her Hana Hana no Mi powers to grab and squeeze Franky's sensitive areas, causing him extreme pain. Luffy protests, not wanting Franky to become 'less than a man.'
events.significance: Robin's forceful persuasion technique becomes a recurring comedic element in convincing Franky to join.

quotes.text: Stop it, Robin! He'll become less than a man!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy protesting Robin's painful persuasion method

events.title: Iceburg Reminds Franky of His Dream
events.description: Iceburg delivers an emotional speech reminding Franky of his childhood dream to build the ultimate ship and sail on it as its shipwright. He suggests that Franky's real reason for not leaving is atonement for Tom being taken away for execution.
events.significance: Reveals Franky's deep-seated guilt over Tom's fate and his original dream, providing the emotional foundation for his decision to join the crew.

quotes.text: Your dream when growing up was to build the ultimate ship and sail on it as its shipwright.
quotes.speaker: Iceburg
quotes.context: Iceburg reminding Franky of his childhood ambitions

events.title: Franky Recalls Building the Franky Family
events.description: Franky has a flashback showing how he built the Franky Family by gathering up the rogues, destitute, and struggling citizens of Water 7, giving them purpose and a home.
events.significance: Provides context for Franky's deep connection to his followers and his reluctance to leave them behind.

events.title: The Franky Family Encourages Franky to Leave
events.description: In a tearful moment, the Franky Family tosses Franky a bag with his belongings packed. They reassure him that they have learned enough from him to protect Water 7 in his absence and want him to pursue his happiness.
events.significance: The Franky Family demonstrates their loyalty and selflessness, releasing Franky from his perceived obligations to them.

events.title: Vice Admiral Garp's Arrival Announced
events.description: Zoro and Sanji return to the ship urgently, announcing that Vice Admiral Garp (Luffy's grandfather) is approaching Water 7 with Marine forces.
events.significance: Creates urgency for the crew's departure and provides the final push for Franky to make his decision.

events.title: Franky Officially Joins the Straw Hat Pirates
events.description: Recognizing that the Straw Hats are amateurs at ship repair and that his masterpiece ship needs a proper shipwright, Franky finally agrees to join the crew. Luffy gives him back his swim briefs, and Franky becomes the seventh member of the Straw Hat Pirates.
events.significance: Franky becomes the shipwright of the Straw Hat Pirates, completing the crew's essential roles. This is a milestone moment as it fulfills Franky's dream to sail on his own ship.

quotes.text: You guys are amateurs at ship repair. That ship needs a proper shipwright!
quotes.speaker: Franky
quotes.context: Franky justifying his decision to join the crew

events.title: Emotional Farewell Between Franky and His Family
events.description: Franky shares an emotional farewell with the Franky Family and the citizens of Water 7. Tears are shed as Franky prepares to depart on his new journey with the Straw Hats.
events.significance: Demonstrates the strong bonds Franky formed in Water 7 and the bittersweet nature of pursuing one's dreams.

themes.description: Franky overcomes his guilt over Tom's death and chooses to pursue his childhood dream of sailing on the ship he built.
themes.symbolism: The Thousand Sunny represents the culmination of Franky's shipbuilding skills and Tom's teachings, making it the perfect vessel for Franky to achieve his dream.

themes.description: The Franky Family demonstrates true familial love by encouraging Franky to leave them behind to pursue his happiness, showing that love sometimes means letting go.
themes.symbolism: The packed bag represents the Franky Family's acceptance and blessing of Franky's new journey.

themes.description: Iceburg helps Franky realize he needs to forgive himself for Tom's fate and honor Tom's legacy by following his dreams rather than punishing himself.
themes.symbolism: Tom's philosophy that shipbuilders should take pride in their vessels is embodied in Franky's decision to sail on the Thousand Sunny.

characterSpotlights.development: Franky overcomes his guilt, accepts the support of his family, and chooses to pursue his dream by joining the Straw Hat Pirates as their shipwright.

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime extends the comedic scenes of Franky running naked through Water 7, adding more reactions from townspeople.
Additional flashback scenes showing Franky building the Franky Family are expanded in the anime.

trivia.fact: Episode 322 marks the conclusion of the Water 7 Saga, which began with episode 229.
Franky is the seventh member to join the Straw Hat Pirates and the second to join after the timeskip recruitment freeze.
This episode is based on Chapter 437 titled 'Naked but Great' from the manga.
The opening song 'Crazy Rainbow' by Tackey & Tsubasa was the eighth One Piece opening and aired for episodes 284-325.
One Piece stopped using ending themes after episode 279, so this episode aired without an ending song.
Kazuki Yao, Franky's original Japanese voice actor, voiced the character from his debut until December 2024, when he was replaced by Subaru Kimura.
